# Templates

FrameWork includes 5 production-ready templates. Each one works out of the box with **demo mode** — no external services required for local development.

## Available Templates

### [Landing Page](/templates/landing-page)
Marketing page with hero, features, testimonials, and email capture.
- **Integration:** SendGrid
- **Port:** 3000

### [CRM](/templates/crm)
Contact management with notes, tags, and search.
- **Integration:** Supabase
- **Port:** 3001

### [Booking](/templates/booking)
Appointment scheduling with calendar, time slots, and SMS reminders.
- **Integration:** Twilio
- **Port:** 3002

### [Dashboard](/templates/dashboard)
Analytics dashboard with KPIs, charts, and activity feed.
- **Integration:** None (bring your own data)
- **Port:** 3003

### [Invoicing](/templates/invoicing)
Invoice management with client tracking and payment processing.
- **Integration:** Stripe
- **Port:** 3004

## Common Features

All templates include:

- ✅ React 18 + TypeScript
- ✅ Vite build system
- ✅ Tailwind CSS styling
- ✅ Responsive design
- ✅ Demo mode (no config needed)
- ✅ Production-ready code

## Request a Template

Want a template we don't have? [Open an issue](https://github.com/framework-hq/framework/issues) on GitHub.
